intents.response: Nearest police station: Use 112 or visit the nearest Police Help Booth shown on the map.
If it's an emergency: Move to a safe, lit area. Press the Panic button to alert contacts and authorities.
To file a report: Use the e-FIR form in the app and submit details.
Area safety is based on risk zones and time of day. Avoid restricted or high-risk zones at night.
